name: Angry Birds Chrome (Remake)
description:
This is a remake of an old game called Angry Birds Chrome. This is currently in beta like the game itself as it is an early release. You basically have to launch birds in a slingshot at the green pigs and destroy all the pigs to win the level. 

To open the level editor and make your own levels, press 'L' twice.

A good computer CPU (Most healthy computers can play) is recommened as loading levels takes a bit of power. It is also recommened to use the Chrome browser for best preformance. How fitting since this game is called Angry Birds Chrome.

Report any bugs in the comments
